author: Samantha Libreri
title: Three arrests at protest at site in Co Wicklow
text:
Six people have been arrested and three garda cars were damaged at a protest at a site earmarked to accommodate international protection applicants in Newtownmountkennedy, Co Wicklow.
Members of the Garda Public Order Unit were also deployed to the site.
Garda√≠ have said that members of the force were on duty at the site this evening, when they came under attack by people gathered there.
In a statement, garda√≠ say that the incident developed "as a result of workers, contracted to carry out lawful employment on the site, entering the site.
"A number of trespassers were also identified on and removed from the site," the statement said.
The statement said that uniform garda√≠ were "subject of both verbal and physical abuse throughout the day, which escalated into rocks and other missiles being thrown this evening".
Fires were lit at the scene, the statement said, and garda√≠ also recovered an axe.
"As the situation has intensified, members of An Garda S√≠och√°na used force to defend themselves as part of an escalated response to the situation," the statement said.
Garda√≠ have said that the Public Order Unit was deployed to the site and that pepper spray was used. Around 50 garda√≠ remain at the site this evening.
Three garda cars were damaged during the incident, the statement said, "including broken windows and slashed tyres".
Garda√≠ have said that it was not aware of anyone being injured in the incident.
In the statement, An Garda S√≠och√°na said that it "respects the right for citizens to exercise their constitutional rights; this right does not extend to breaches of Criminal Law, the interference with the rights of other citizens to carry out their daily activities, or to attack members of An Garda S√≠och√°na.
"Any Garda activity in relation to evolving events involves a graduated policing response taking into account relevant legislation and public safety, with enforcement as a last resort."
Videos online appear to show material being burned at the entrance to the site known as Trudder House or River Lodge.
Earlier, videos also appeared to show some scuffles between garda√≠ and protesters.
There have been ongoing protests in the area since construction work began last month on the former HSE site, which the Department of Integration said it was considering locating 20 eight-person tents for international protection applicants.
Earlier this month, a small fire was lit on the site which garda√≠ confirmed they were investigating.
Locals say they object to the site being used to accommodate asylum seekers, saying the site is unsuitable and that the resources of the village are already overstreched.
Additional reporting: Paul Reynolds

author: CNN Newssource
title: No, Taylor Swift did not endorse Kamala Harris in a photo
text:
No, Taylor Swift did not endorse Kamala Harris in a photo
By Elizabeth Wagmeister, CNN
(CNN) ‚Äî Taylor Swift‚Äôs supporters are keenly adept at reading into the singer‚Äôs lyrics and social media posts. And Swift is keenly masterful at providing what are known as ‚ÄúEaster eggs‚Äù for her fans, laying secret clues and hidden messages for her followers to dissect and discuss.
This week, a
photo shared by Swift that included a silhouette of a woman in a pantsuit ‚Äî perhaps similar to one that could have been worn by Vice President Kamala Harris ‚Äî had some fans suggesting the superstar had laid a massive Easter egg, giving her presidential endorsement to Harris.
But that‚Äôs not the case.
The
image in question, posted Wednesday on Swift‚Äôs Instagram in a carousel of ten images, shows Swift center stage performing in Warsaw, Poland. In the background of the image, a woman in a pantsuit is pictured waving as she walks off the stage. Some speculated the woman pictured was depicting a silhouette of Harris, but it‚Äôs actually one of Swift‚Äôs background singers, who wear pantsuits during the particular set that was pictured in Swift‚Äôs post. A closer look at Swift‚Äôs posts from other Eras Tour stops, shows the background performers pictured in clearer focus in the pantsuit costumes.
Also, the woman in the silhouette mistaken to be Harris is wearing boots, part of the performers‚Äô costumes
seen in other photos from the tour. (Though the vice president has been photographed wearing boots before, she typically wears pumps, or, more recently, sneakers with her suits.)
Further evidence of no endorsement? Swift‚Äôs caption did not reference anything evoking politics.
‚ÄúOh I loved those Warsaw shows SO much!!! Our first time ever playing in Poland, but it won‚Äôt be the last,‚Äù Swift wrote with the carousel of photos. ‚ÄúI seriously had the best time üòÜ Also want to thank those beautiful crowds for making us the first tour to play 3 nights in a row in your stadium!!‚Äù
Yet, some Harris supporters still thought they may have picked up on a clue.
‚ÄúTaylor Swift just low key endorsed Kamala Harris and MAGA is losing their minds,‚Äù the group Call to Activism
wrote on X.
CNN has reached out to representatives for Swift for comment.
Swift posted the image hours before
organizers canceled three of her concerts in Austria after authorities said they foiled a terror attack planned for the Vienna leg of her tour.
Swift‚Äôs political past
Supporters, political pundits, media figures and likely the Harris campaign itself is closely watching for Swift‚Äôs endorsement, wondering if ‚Äî or when ‚Äî it may come.
One of the most influential stars on the planet, Swift‚Äôs endorsement could have major impact with her hundreds of millions of fans around the world.
In fact, a community of ‚ÄúSwifties for Kamala‚Äù has already emerged, without the star‚Äôs participation, with thousands of Swift‚Äôs fans making signature friendship bracelets to support Harris and voicing their support of the vice president loudly across social media.
Swift has yet to speak out about Harris or former President Donald Trump this election cycle, but she
endorsed President Joe Biden and Harris in their bid for the White House in 2020.
‚ÄúThe change we need most is to elect a president who recognizes that people of color deserve to feel safe and represented, that women deserve the right to choose what happens to their bodies, and that the LGBTQIA+ community deserves to be acknowledged and included,‚Äù
Swift told V magazine in October 2020 about her endorsement. ‚ÄúEveryone deserves a government that takes global health risks seriously and puts the lives of its people first. The only way we can begin to make things better is to choose leaders who are willing to face these issues and find ways to work through them.‚Äù
On
social media at the time, Swift shared the cover of the magazine and joked, ‚ÄúSo apt that it‚Äôs come out on the night of the VP debate. Gonna be watching and supporting @KamalaHarris by yelling at the tv a lot.‚Äù
In 2020, Swift
tweeted about Trump, writing, ‚ÄúAfter stoking the fires of white supremacy and racism your entire presidency, you have the nerve to feign moral superiority before threatening violence? ‚ÄòWhen the looting starts the shooting starts‚Äô??? We will vote you out in November.‚Äù
Swift largely stayed away from politics for the first decade of her career. But in her 2020 documentary ‚ÄúMiss Americana,‚Äù she expressed regret for not speaking up sooner.
In a scene where her father told her that she could face backlash and media scrutiny for speaking out against Trump, Swift responded, ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt care if they write that.‚Äù She told her father, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sad that I didn‚Äôt two years ago, but I can‚Äôt change that. I‚Äôm saying right now, that this is something I know is right ‚Ä¶ I need to be on the right side of history.‚Äù
Speculation about a 2024 endorsement from Swift has been going on for months.
Leading up the Super Bowl, right-wing media and some Republicans suggested Swift was part of an alleged conspiracy staged by the NFL and Democratic Party to deliver the 2024 presidential election to Biden.
Trump recently spoke about Swift, calling her ‚Äúbeautiful‚Äù but ‚Äúliberal‚Äù in a new book about ‚ÄúThe Apprentice.‚Äù
‚ÄúI think she‚Äôs beautiful ‚Äî very beautiful! I find her very beautiful. I think she‚Äôs liberal. She probably doesn‚Äôt like Trump,‚Äù the former president told author Ramin Setoodeh in his book,
‚ÄúApprentice in Wonderland.‚Äù
‚ÄúI hear she‚Äôs very talented,‚Äù Trump said. ‚ÄúI think she‚Äôs very beautiful, actually ‚Äî unusually beautiful!‚Äù
After the book was released, Swifties on the left of the political spectrum took to social media with a message for the former president: ‚Äú
Stay away from her.‚Äù
The-CNN-Wire
‚Ñ¢ & ¬© 2024 Cable News Network, Inc., a Warner Bros. Discovery Company. All rights reserved.

title: El Gran Telescopio Milim√©trico, en vilo por presupuesto para 2025 | El Universal
text:
No pinta un buen panorama para el Gran Telescopio Milim√©trico (GTM), pues en el Proyecto de Presupuesto de Egresos de la Federaci√≥n (PPEF), la instituci√≥n que lo administra, el Instituto Nacional de Astrof√≠sica, √ìptica y Electr√≥nica (INAOE), podr√≠a tener una reducci√≥n de 5.2% de su presupuesto; en 2024 se le asignaron 419.6 millones de pesos y para 2025 se consideran 397.9 millones de pesos. Este a√±o se alert√≥ que este telescopio ‚Äî√∫nico en el mundo y que ayud√≥ a capturar la primera fotograf√≠a de un agujero negro‚Äî se quedar√≠a sin fondos. La entonces directora de Conahcyt, Mar√≠a Elena √Ålvarez-Buylla , se lav√≥ las manos diciendo que para entonces ya habr√≠a otra persona en su cargo, mientras que el director del INAOE, Edmundo A. Guti√©rrez , dijo que apelar√≠a a pedir m√°s presupuesto para 2025. Ante el anuncio de esta posible reducci√≥n, queda claro que el mantenimiento del GTM no fue considerado y se encamina a la deriva. author: Sky UK Limited
title: Prince Harry to be recognised as Living Legend of Aviation for services to British Army | US News | Sky News
text: Prince Harry recognised as Living Legend of Aviation for services to British Army The duke's appearance at the award ceremony in Beverly Hills comes on the same day he dropped a libel claim against Associated Newspapers Limited. Saturday 20 January 2024 08:57, UK Prince Harry has been presented with an award for his services to the British Army at a glitzy ceremony in Los Angeles. Just hours after the Duke of Sussex [withdrew his libel claim](https://news.sky.com/story/prince-harry-withdraws-libel-claim-against-mail-on-sunday-publisher-13051665) against the publisher of the Mail on Sunday, he attended the Beverly Hilton Hotel where was inducted into the Living Legends of Aviation for his work as a British Army veteran and pilot . The 39-year-old completed [two tours of Afghanistan](https://news.sky.com/story/prince-harry-there-was-an-unravelling-after-tour-of-afghanistan-12950628) as a forward air controller and an Apache helicopter pilot, having flown countless training missions in the UK, US and Australia. He served in the military for 10 years, rising to the rank of captain, and later founded the [Invictus Games](https://news.sky.com/topic/invictus-games-7093) - a sporting event for wounded military personnel and veterans. Hosted by actor and aviation ambassador John Travolta, the duke was inducted alongside US Navy pilot Fred George, former world speed record holder Steve Hinton, and [Jeff Bezos'](https://news.sky.com/topic/jeff-bezos-7701) fiancee, Lauren Sanchez. Similar to her husband - who has already been inducted - Sanchez received the Elling Halvorson Vertical Flight Hall of Fame Award for her skills as a helicopter pilot and aviation businesswoman. The Duchess of Sussex, who had been expected to attend the event, was not present as one of their children became unwell, the PA news agency understands. The duke was described as a "humanitarian, military veteran, mental wellness advocate and environmentalist" on the awards website. "He has dedicated his life to advancing causes that he is passionate about and that bring about permanent change for people and places," a statement read. Earlier on Friday, Prince Harry dropped a libel claim against Associated Newspapers Limited over a February 2022 article about his legal challenge against the Home Office following a decision to change his publicly funded security arrangements when visiting the UK. [ ](https://news.sky.com/download-app) Be the first to get Breaking News Install the Sky News app for free Read more US news: [Alec Baldwin charged again over fatal shooting on film set](https://news.sky.com/story/alec-baldwin-indicted-on-involuntary-manslaughter-over-rust-shooting-death-13051878) [Moment flames shoot out of Boeing 747](https://news.sky.com/story/footage-shows-moment-flames-shoot-out-of-boeing-747-13051697) [Teacher accused of poisoning husband's smoothie](https://news.sky.com/story/teacher-accused-of-poisoning-husbands-smoothie-with-toxic-lily-of-the-valley-plant-in-us-13051587) The story claimed [Harry](https://news.sky.com/topic/prince-harry-5826) "tried to keep details of his legal battle to reinstate his police protection secret from the public". A ruling was scheduled to take place between May and July, until the duke's lawyers filed a notice of discontinuance at the High Court in London. Meanwhile, a spokesperson said the duke's focus remains "on the safety of his family" and on his legal action against the Home Office.

author: FC Barcelona Noticias
title: ¬øEl 'heredero' de Leo Messi? El Barcelona le dar√≠a la '10' a Lamine Yamal la pr√≥xima temporada
text:
LAMINE, LA NUEVA GRAN ESTRELLA DEL BAR√áA
¬øEl 'heredero' de Leo Messi? El Barcelona le dar√≠a la '10' a Lamine Yamal la pr√≥xima temporada
Publicaci√≥n:16/01/2025 - 21:49h
Actualizaci√≥n:16/01/2025 - 21:49h
El FC Barcelona continuar√° empoderando a Lamine Yamal. ¬øPor qu√©? Todo parece indicar que le confiar√°n la gran responsabilidad de llevar la emblem√°tica camiseta n√∫mero 10
Portar la camiseta n√∫mero 10 de cualquier equipo de f√∫tbol supone un reto may√∫sculo para el futbolista que lo asume. Y es que, efectivamente, la '10' suele ser sin√≥nimo de un jugador diferente, especial, t√©cnicamente dotado y con la calidad suficiente para inclinar el compromiso a favor de su conjunto con tan solo un gesto t√©cnico. Un elemento de esos que tienen 'aura'.
En el FC Barcelona, esto no es una excepci√≥n, ya que la camiseta n√∫mero '10' ha sido llevada por varios de los mejores futbolistas en la historia de la instituci√≥n, tales como Ronaldinho, Rivaldo, Maradona, entre otros. Sin embargo, el m√°s ic√≥nico de todos ellos ha sido Lionel Andr√©s Messi, seguramente el mejor jugador en la historia del club, con la mayor cantidad de compromisos afrontados (778), goles (672) y asistencias (303), siendo el protagonista indiscutible de varias gestas hist√≥ricas para el equipo azulgrana.
Ahora, al llevar un jugador de tal calibre la camiseta n√∫mero 10, la pregunta era inminentemente obvia: cuando Leo Messi decidiera retirarse o se marchara del club por cualquier otro motivo, ¬øqui√©n ser√≠a el encargado de portar tal el√°stica, con tanta historia en sus hombros? La fecha lleg√≥ y el argentino anunci√≥ su dolorosa salida del Barcelona en el a√±o 2021, dejando esa el√°stica vacante y esa gran inc√≥gnita en el ambiente.
Ansu Fati se present√≥ como un posible heredero para la '10' de Leo Messi
Esta inc√≥gnita la resolver√≠a el club, otorgando la '10' a Ansu Fati ese mismo a√±o 2021. El de Bis√°u emergi√≥ en el primer equipo con m√©ritos y una irrupci√≥n estelar, convirti√©ndose en un claro candidato para ser el digno heredero de esa magna responsabilidad.
Lamentablemente, debido a circunstancias del destino y una carrera marcada por la irregularidad y las lesiones,
Ansu Fati no pudo cumplir con todas las expectativas puestas en √©l en el Barcelona. Esto sugiere que, a menos que haya un cambio en la situaci√≥n del delantero, es solo cuesti√≥n de tiempo que deje vacante esa camiseta.
Lamine Yamal: ¬øEl nuevo '10' del Barcelona?
De quedar vacante esa camiseta, aparentemente ya hay un candidato a enfund√°rsela ¬°Y qu√© candidato! Seg√∫n coment√≥ el periodista Jota Jordi en el 'Chiringuito de Jugones', el inequ√≠voco aspirante a llevar la ‚Äò10‚Äô del Barcelona de cara a la pr√≥xima temporada es Lamine Yamal: "Lamine llevar√° la '10' en el Bar√ßa el a√±o que viene".
Lamine Yamal tiene grandes fundamentos para sostener su candidatura a ser el '10' del FC Barcelona. El delantero, que actualmente porta la camiseta '19', como lo hiciera Leo Messi en su momento antes de llevar la m√≠tica '10', a sus escasos 17 a√±os se ha convertido en
la gran estrella joven del Bar√ßa y, ¬øpor qu√© no?, del f√∫tbol mundial.
Este asunto va m√°s all√° de las estad√≠sticas, se trata tambi√©n de lo que demuestra en el terreno de juego. Es aquel jugador que, al tomar la pelota, crea esa innegable sensaci√≥n de que algo podr√≠a suceder. Posee una calidad, creatividad y capacidad de invenci√≥n que pone con total descaro al servicio del combinado catal√°n y de la selecci√≥n espa√±ola, convirti√©ndose en un dolor de cabeza para sus rivales.
Pudiera ser un aut√©ntico golpe de mercado
Ya ha sido ampliamente elogiado y su incipiente leyenda comienza a crecer. Se ha convertido en una referencia a nivel mundial y, por supuesto, en el jugador al que los rivales observan detenidamente, elaborando planes espec√≠ficos para limitar su impacto. Adem√°s, es un recurso al que sus compa√±eros recurren para desbloquear el partido con alguna jugada peligrosa.
A su vez, es esa figura que reclama una afici√≥n que se hab√≠a sentido desolada tras el adi√≥s de Leo Messi y la desaz√≥n con Ansu Fati. Con Lamine, han recuperado la esperanza de tener a un 'crack' de talla mundial, un cari√±o que se refleja en los aplausos que recibe y, a√∫n m√°s, en las camisetas con su nombre,
siendo la m√°s solicitada en las tiendas. ¬øSe imaginan si finalmente asume la responsabilidad de llevar la camiseta ‚Äò10‚Äô? Es algo para reflexionar...

author: GlobeNewswire
title: First clinical trial of vosoritide for children with hypochondroplasia shows increased growth | User | bigspringherald.com
text:
WASHINGTON, April 11, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Vosoritide‚Äôs first global phase 2 study showed an average increased growth rate of 1.8 cm per year in children with hypochondroplasia, a genetic cause of short stature in children, according to researchers from Children‚Äôs National Hospital.
‚ÄúThis is the first medicine that has been developed to specifically target the pathway involved in hypochondroplasia,‚Äù says Andrew Dauber, M.D. , chief of Endocrinology at Children‚Äôs National. ‚ÄúThese findings will help inform future studies of vosoritide for addressing growth disorders.‚Äù
This clinical trial funded by BioMarin is the first-of-its-kind to treat children with genetic short stature who do not have achondroplasia.
The team found the annualized growth velocity increased by 2.26 standard deviation (SD) and the height standard deviation score (SDS) increased by 0.36 SD during the treatment period versus the observation period. Hypochondroplasia specific height SDS increased by 0.38 SD, according to the trial published in eClinicalMedicine .
The authors studied 24 children with hypochondroplasia. Half were female and 22 out of 24 had the p.Asn540Lys variant in the fibroblast growth factor receptor 3 (FGFR3) gene. The mean age was 5.86 years old, and the baseline height was between -4.78 SD to -2.27 SD. The trial consisted of a 6-month observation period to establish a baseline annualized growth velocity followed by a 12-month intervention period during which vosoritide was administered daily via subcutaneous injection at a dose of 15 micrograms/kg/day.
The researchers found the absolute annualized growth velocity increased from a mean of 5.12 +/- 1.36 cm/year during the observation period to 6.93 +/- 0.93 cm/year during the intervention period for a mean difference of 1.81 cm/year for children with this condition. During the trial, the researchers also noted there were no treatment-related serious adverse events and no one discontinued therapy.
The study findings also showed standing height SDS increased by 0.37 SD during the year of treatment or 0.41 SD using hypochondroplasia specific growth charts.
Other growth-related conditions included in this phase 2 trial were Noonan syndrome, Neurofibromatosis type 1, Costello syndrome, NPR2 mutations and Aggrecan mutations. This manuscript includes only information specific to hypochondroplasia. Full data for all conditions studied in the trial will be available at a later date.
‚ÄúPatients have come from all over the world to be part of our trial,‚Äù Dr. Dauber says. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre excited to see how well tolerated the medication was and how some patients had excellent responses.‚Äù
Media contact: Beth Riggs | briggs@childrensnational.org
###
About Children‚Äôs National Hospital
Children‚Äôs National Hospital, based in Washington, D.C., was established in 1870 to help every child grow up stronger.Today, it is the No. 5 children‚Äôs hospital in the nation and ranked in all specialties evaluated by U.S. News & World Report. Children‚Äôs National is transforming pediatric medicine for all children. The Children‚Äôs National Research & Innovation Campus opened in 2021, a first-of-its-kind pediatric hub dedicated to developing new and better ways to care for kids. Children‚Äôs National has been designated three times in a row as a Magnet¬Æ hospital, demonstrating the highest standards of nursing and patient care delivery. This pediatric academic health system offers expert care through a convenient, community-based primary care network and specialty care locations in the D.C. metropolitan area, including Maryland and Virginia. Children‚Äôs National is home to the Children‚Äôs National Research Institute and Sheikh Zayed Institute for Pediatric Surgical Innovation . It is recognized for its expertise and innovation in pediatric care and as a strong voice for children through advocacy at the local, regional and national levels. As a non-profit, Children's National relies on generous donors to help ensure that every child receives the care they need.
For more information, follow us on Facebook , Instagram , Twitter and LinkedIn .
Beth Riggs Children's National Hospital briggs@childrensnational.org
